decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with 1drawing / document title number(s): 02-364GF-EX-PL2; 03-364GF-EX-PL1; 04-364GF-EX-PL2; 05-364GF-EX-PL2; 06-364GF-EX-PL2; 07-364GF-EX-PL2; 08-364GF-EX-PL2; 09-364GF-EX-PL2; 10-364GF-EX-PL2; 02-364GF-PR-PL2; 364WA-ZZ-00-DR-A-05100-Proposed Ground Floor Plan-P01; 364WA-ZZ-01-DR-A-05101-Proposed First Floor Plan-P01; 364WA-ZZ-02-DR-A-05102-Proposed Loft Plan-P01; 364WA-ZZ-RL-DR-A-05103-Proposed Roof Plan-P01; 364WA-ZZ-XX-DR-A-05010-Proposed Site Plan-P01; 364WA-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-05300-Proposed Section-P01; 364WA-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-05401-Proposed North Elevation-P01; 364WA-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-05402-Proposed East Elevation-P01; 364WA-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-05403-Proposed South Elevation-P01; 364WA-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-05404-Proposed West Elevation-P01
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Schedule 2 Part 3 Class L of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order), the residential unit hereby approved shall at no time be converted from C3 residential to a C4 small HMO, without express planning permission having first been granted by the Local Planning Authority.

Reason:  To prevent the overdevelopment of the site and to safeguard the living conditions of adjoining properties and visual appearance of the building, in accordance with policies 3.5, 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4, and D6 and of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
description: Part single part two storey side/rear extension, rear roof extension and installation of rooflights
